```{r setup}
load("../data/Breast.RData")

grid.support <- list(K = 5, alpha = 0.5, cluster.number = 2)


```



```{r tuning.snf}
tuning.result <- Tuning(data.list = breast.data$data.list, method = "snf",
                        grid.support = grid.support, metric = "completeness",
                        ground.truth = breast.data$partition, parallel = TRUE, plot = TRUE)
```





```{r tuning.check}
val <- MetricValues(tuning.result$method.res, ground.truth = breast.data$partition, internal.metrics = "asw.affinity")
```
